channel.title: I need help please! easy help
channel.description: I downloaded source , client , i did everything , but how can i change the client ip , because i sent the same client to my friend and he cant log in. I want to change the client ip to defectionscape.no-ip.biz so he can log!! :(

item.title: I need help please! easy help
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

this is client-sided
go to EGUI.java or GUI.java and where it says “127.0.0.1” change that you your server IP

Read full topic
item.source: I need help please! easy help
